title: This game is garbage and so are 90% of the player base.
body: I'm sick of all of you useless, selfish scum bags that go into game and feed, let your fed laners roam, don't ping, don't help, and generally make it miserable for everyone else on the team. All of you scum bags that just lurk around and wait for everyone else to die so you can pick up a kill or two, meanwhile you just lost two turrets. Team game my ass.

replies.body:
2 options. 

1. Stop playing.
2. Accept that everyone is trash and play accordingly.

Hes half right. Atleast as far as the player base. Got people saying ww is op with a mere 51% winrate with 125+ games and Kindred is trash when people with 125+ games have 60-70% winrates. People are idiots when it comes to this game.

This game is fine though. Riot has league in a healthy position and is still the leading monopoly. They aren't going anywhere and I hope they don't. They are doing a fine job. (doesn't mean I dont disagree from time to time)
Sounds like a typical normals game to me, play ranked, it'll be a lot better.
I am looking at your history, and it seems like you are having a few bad games. It happens, I think if you just stuck to 1 or 2 champions you would be better off. (In ranked at least)

Well im sorry you feel that way. Huh, I guess according to you I'm in that  top 10% you specified as not being garbage and since you made this post i'd assume you also aren't by your definition garbage...

So this is what you think of yourself.

>I'm a useless, selfish scum bag that goes into game and feeds, lets my fed laners roam, don't ping, don't help, and generally make it miserable for everyone else on my team. Scum bags like me that just lurk around and wait for everyone else to die so I can pick up a kill or two, meanwhile you just lost two turrets. Team game my ass.
